entries.description: SAM template.yaml syntax support for PayloadFormatVersion, HttpApi event source, HttpApiFunctionAuth #2867
iam: ignore permission check when denial comes from organization csp policy
Improve extension start-up performance, especially on devices with slower file systems
Duplicate resource type definitions break the "Resources" node (#3132)
SAM template.yaml syntax support for FunctionResponseTypes #2924
SAM: run/debug now works for a larger variety of TypeScript projects
Upload Lambda wizard will skip prompts and auto select parent directory when invoked from a template file.
